mapper.select:
select m.USERNAME AS username,
from rocky_borrow b,rocky_member m where 1=1 AND b.USER_ID = m.ID AND b.ID = #{borrowId} AND (( b.status in (1,2,4,5,6,7,42) AND (b.APPRSTATUS in (0,3,4) OR (b.APPRSTATUS = 2 AND b.TIMING_BORROW_TIME is not null)) ) or b.status in(-1,-2,-3))

select m.USERNAME AS username,
from rocky_borrow b,rocky_member m where 1=1 AND b.USER_ID = m.ID AND b.ID = #{borrowId} AND b.status in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,42,-1,-2,-3)

SELECT CASE(b.STYLE) WHEN 4 THEN 1 WHEN 3 THEN 1 ELSE b.TIME_LIMIT - r.ORDER +1 END AS remainPeriods, r.REPAYMENT_TIME AS repaymentTime, r.STATUS AS status FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r, rocky_borrow b WHERE r.BORROW_ID = b.id AND r.STATUS IN (0,4) AND r.BORROW_ID = #{borrowId} ORDER BY r.ORDER LIMIT 1
SELECT ROUND(SUM(REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT),2) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord WHERE 1=1 AND BORROW_ID = #{borrowId} AND STATUS IN (0,4)
SELECT ROUND(SUM(REPAYMENT_YESACCOUNT),2) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord WHERE 1=1 AND BORROW_ID = #{borrowId} AND STATUS = 1

SELECT r.ORDER AS webPayOrder, r.ADVANCETIME AS advanceTime, ROUND(r.ADVANCE_YESACCOUNT,2) AS advanceYesAccount, r.WEBSTATUS AS webStatus FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE 1=1 AND r.STATUS = 0 AND r.WEBSTATUS IN (1,5) AND r.BORROW_ID = #{borrowId} ORDER BY r.ORDER LIMIT 1

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE USER_ID=#{memberId} and status >=4 AND PLEDGE_TYPE=1)AS borrowCount, (SELECT ROUND(SUM(ACCOUNT),2) FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE USER_ID=#{memberId} and status >=4 AND PLEDGE_TYPE=1)AS borrowAccount, (SELECT ROUND(SUM(ACCOUNT),2) FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE USER_ID=#{memberId} and status >=2 AND PLEDGE_TYPE=1)AS creditMoney FROM DUAL
